description.en:
The emergency medicine practice cycle is focused on primary assessment and treatment of acutely ill or injured patients in emergency department. Students will learn about the organisation of emergency medicine, triage and obtain practical skills for initial management of emergency patient. 
At least 100 corresponding AMBOSS platform cases must be solved during the emergency medicine cycle, the completion will be checked up on at the end of the semester.
description.et:
EM praktika põhitähelepanu on pööratud erakorraliste seisundite esmasele diagnostikale ja ravile erakorralise meditsiini osakonnas. Osalemise eelduseks on arstiõppe viie esimese kursuse läbimine. Üliõpilased õpivad tundma erakorralise meditsiini organisatsiooni ja patsientide tiraaži põhimõtteid, omandavad kliinilise kogemuse ja praktilised oskused erakorraliste haigete esmasel haiglakäsitlusel. 
Üliõpilasel on kohustus lahendada erakorralise meditsiini tsükli jooksul minimaalselt 100 AMBOSSi õppeplatvormi vastava eriala küsimust. Küsimuste lahendamist kontrollitakse semestri lõpus.

objectives.en: The goal of emergency medicine practice cycle is to provide a clinical experience in emergency department: organisation of emergency medicine, incl. patient triage principles, the recognition, differential diagnosis and primary treatment of acutely ill or injured patient, incl. major trauma.
objectives.et: Erakorralise meditsiini praktika eesmärk on omandada praktilised oskused ja teadmised erakorraliste haigete esmasel käsitlemisel erakorralise meditsiini osakonnas. Õpitakse tundma erakorralise meditsiini korraldust, sh haigete tiraaži põhimõtteid, omandatakse praktilist kogemust erinevate erakorraliste seisundite diferentsiaaldiagnostikas ja esmases ravis. Omandatakse erakorralise kirurgilise haige (sh raske trauma) ja kriitiliste seisundite esmase käsitluse põhimõtted.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the emergency medicine cycle the Student:
- knows the organisation of emergency medicine and is able to perform triage in emergency department
learning_outcomes.et: -	orienteerub erakorralise meditsiini korralduses, tunneb erakorralise meditsiini osakonna haigete tiraaži põhimõtteid ja oskab määrata tiraaži kategooria

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to contact with the patient and to collect disease history, is able to perform objective examination of the patient and to assess the results of investigation or analysis
learning_outcomes.et: -	oskab koguda haiguse, trauma ja mürgistuse anamneesi, teostada patsiendi objektiivse uurimise ja hinnata patsiendi elulisi näitajaid

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to perform basic medical manipulations and investigations according to recommendation of clinical practice logbook
learning_outcomes.et: -	oskab teostada lihtsamaid kliinilisi protseduure ja uuringuid ning tõlgendada nende tulemusi (vt. praktilised oskused kliinilise praktika päevikus)

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the primary management of a patient in critical condition (cardiac arrest, major trauma, life-threatening arrhythmias, acute coronary syndrome, acute respiratory failure, acute renal failure, coma and shock)
learning_outcomes.et: -	tunneb kriitilises seisus patsiendi esmase käsitluse põhimõtteid (kliiniline surm, raske trauma, eluohtlik südame rütmihäire, äge koronaarsündroom,  äge hingamispuudulikkus, äge neerupuudulikkus, kooma ja šokk)

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to complete medial documentation in emergency department
learning_outcomes.et: -	teab, kuidas täita arstliku dokumentatsiooni erakorralise meditsiini osakonnas

description.et: Completion and submission of a practice log book

At least 100 corresponding AMBOSS platform cases must be solved during the emergency medicine cycle, the completion will be checked up on at the end of the semester.
Clinical practice is a mandatory module in the curriculum of Medicine. In the year system, students must take their courses in the order established in the curriculum and complete 100% of the compulsory course workload prescribed by their curricula by the end of the semester. Therefore, if the mandatory AMBOSS cases have not been solved by the end of the semester the clauses 150 and 150.3.1 in the Study Regulations will be applied, ie on the initiative of the university, a student is deleted from the matriculation register by the directive of the vice rector for academic affairs based on the proposal of the vice dean for academic affairs for not having completed the curriculum to the required minimum extent by the end of the semester in case specified in clause 76.
